languages.text: "О ней и ее людях можно не беспокоиться — они ждут возможности отчитаться перед маршалом. Уж что-что, а терпеливо ждать они умеют". {n}Соломон немного понижает голос.{/n} "Я не сообщал Йегер о связи стража Летуса с леди Теодорой — ей ни к чему это знать".

"There is no need to worry about her or her people — they are waiting for an opportunity to give the Marshal their report. If there is one thing they do well, it's waiting patiently." {n}Solomorne lowers his voice.{/n} "I didn't tell Yeager about the connection between the watcher of Leethus and Theodora — she doesn't need to know."
languages.original_text: "О ней и ее людях можно не беспокоиться — они ждут возможности отчитаться перед маршалом. Уж что-что, а терпеливо ждать они умеют". {n}Соломон немного понижает голос.{/n} "Я не сообщал Йегер о связи стража Летуса с леди Теодорой — ей ни к чему это знать".

If there is one thing they do well, it's waiting patiently." {n}Solomorne lowers his voice.{/n} "I didn't tell Yeager about the connection between the watcher of Leethus and Theodora — she doesn't need to know."

"There is no need to worry about her or her people — they are waiting for an opportunity to give the Marshal their report. If there is one thing they do well, it's waiting patiently." {n}Solomorne lowers his voice.{/n} "I didn't tell Yeager about the connection between the watcher of Leethus and Theodora — she doesn't need to know."

languages.text: 「彼女やその部下たちのことを心配する必要はありません。彼らは将帥に報告する機会をうかがっているだけです。彼らが唯一得意としていることがあるとすれば、それは辛抱強く待つことです」{n}ソロモーンは声を落とした。{/n}「リーザスの監視者とシオドーラの関係については、イェーガーには話していません。彼女が知る必要はありませんから」
languages.original_text: "There is no need to worry about her or her people — they are waiting for an opportunity to give the Marshal their report. If there is one thing they do well, it's waiting patiently." {n}Solomorne lowers his voice.{/n} "I didn't tell Yeager about the connection between the watcher of Leethus and Theodora — she doesn't need to know."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女やその部下たちのことを心配する必要はありません。彼らは将帥に報告する機会をうかがっているだけです。彼らが唯一得意としていることがあるとすれば、それは辛抱強く待つことです」{n}ソロモーンは声を落とした。{/n}「リーザスの監視者とシオドーラの関係については、イェーガーには話していません。彼女が知る必要はありませんから」

languages.text: "Ihr müsst Euch um sie oder ihre Leute nicht sorgen – sie warten auf eine Gelegenheit, dem Marschall Bericht zu erstatten. Und wenn sie etwas gut können, dann ist das geduldiges Warten." {n}Solomorne senkt die Stimme.{/n} "Ich habe Yeager nichts von der Verbindung zwischen dem Wächter von Leethus und Theodora gesagt – sie muss es nicht wissen."
languages.original_text: "There is no need to worry about her or her people — they are waiting for an opportunity to give the Marshal their report. If there is one thing they do well, it's waiting patiently." {n}Solomorne lowers his voice.{/n} "I didn't tell Yeager about the connection between the watcher of Leethus and Theodora — she doesn't need to know."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr müsst Euch um sie oder ihre Leute nicht sorgen – sie warten auf eine Gelegenheit, dem Marschall Bericht zu erstatten. Und wenn sie etwas gut können, dann ist das geduldiges Warten." {n}Solomorne senkt die Stimme.{/n} "Ich habe Yeager nichts von der Verbindung zwischen dem Wächter von Leethus und Theodora gesagt – sie muss es nicht wissen."

languages.text: « Nulle raison de vous inquiéter pour elle ou pour ses hommes. Ils attendent une occasion de fournir leur rapport au maréchal. Leur plus grande qualité reste leur patience. » {n}Solomorne baisse d'un ton.{/n} « Je n'ai pas jugé utile de mentionner à Yeager le lien entre le gardien de Leethus et Théodora. Elle n'a pas besoin de le savoir. »
languages.original_text: "There is no need to worry about her or her people — they are waiting for an opportunity to give the Marshal their report. If there is one thing they do well, it's waiting patiently." {n}Solomorne lowers his voice.{/n} "I didn't tell Yeager about the connection between the watcher of Leethus and Theodora — she doesn't need to know."

traits.locale_text: « Nulle raison de vous inquiéter pour elle ou pour ses hommes. Ils attendent une occasion de fournir leur rapport au maréchal. Leur plus grande qualité reste leur patience. » {n}Solomorne baisse d'un ton.{/n} « Je n'ai pas jugé utile de mentionner à Yeager le lien entre le gardien de Leethus et Théodora. Elle n'a pas besoin de le savoir. »

languages.text: «No hay necesidad de preocuparse por ella ni por los suyos: esperan una ocasión para entregar su informe al mariscal. Si hay algo que se les da bien es esperar con paciencia». {n}Solomorne baja la voz.{/n} «No le conté nada a Yeager sobre la relación entre el vigilante de Leethus y Theodora; no tiene por qué saberlo».
languages.original_text: "There is no need to worry about her or her people — they are waiting for an opportunity to give the Marshal their report. If there is one thing they do well, it's waiting patiently." {n}Solomorne lowers his voice.{/n} "I didn't tell Yeager about the connection between the watcher of Leethus and Theodora — she doesn't need to know."

traits.locale_text: «No hay necesidad de preocuparse por ella ni por los suyos: esperan una ocasión para entregar su informe al mariscal. Si hay algo que se les da bien es esperar con paciencia». {n}Solomorne baja la voz.{/n} «No le conté nada a Yeager sobre la relación entre el vigilante de Leethus y Theodora; no tiene por qué saberlo».

languages.text: “无需担心她和她的队员，他们正在等待时机向元帅进行报告。如果说他们最擅长什么，那就是耐心等待。”{n}随后，索罗蒙压低了声音。{/n}“利瑟斯的守望者与西奥多拉之间的事情，我没有告诉过耶格尔，她不需要知道这些。”
languages.original_text: "There is no need to worry about her or her people — they are waiting for an opportunity to give the Marshal their report. If there is one thing they do well, it's waiting patiently." {n}Solomorne lowers his voice.{/n} "I didn't tell Yeager about the connection between the watcher of Leethus and Theodora — she doesn't need to know."

traits.locale_text: “无需担心她和她的队员，他们正在等待时机向元帅进行报告。如果说他们最擅长什么，那就是耐心等待。”{n}随后，索罗蒙压低了声音。{/n}“利瑟斯的守望者与西奥多拉之间的事情，我没有告诉过耶格尔，她不需要知道这些。”

languages.text: "Üsteğmen Yeager veya adamları adına endişelenmenize gerek yok, Miralay'a raporlarını iletmek için bir fırsat kolluyorlar. İyi yaptıkları bir şey varsa o da sabırla beklemektir." {n}Solomorne sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Yeager'a Leethus Gözcüsü ile Theodora arasındaki bağlantıyı söylemedim. Bilmesi gerekmiyor."
languages.original_text: "There is no need to worry about her or her people — they are waiting for an opportunity to give the Marshal their report. If there is one thing they do well, it's waiting patiently." {n}Solomorne lowers his voice.{/n} "I didn't tell Yeager about the connection between the watcher of Leethus and Theodora — she doesn't need to know."
